short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in a dramatic space experience with Cosmic Cataclysm.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This theme features a stunning celestial scene of a fractured, molten planet on the brink of destruction, surrounded by glowing debris and vibrant stars against the endless void of space. Perfect for lovers of sci-fi and the mysteries of the cosmos, this extension brings an intense and otherworldly energy to your browser, transforming every new tab into a portal to a cosmic apocalypse.  It also provides real-time weather information and your current location directly in the new tab.
